Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
ted.wguc195.controllers.BaseController
ted.wguc195.controllers.AppointmentController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddAppointmentController, UpdateAppointmentController
public abstract class AppointmentController extends BaseController
Abstract controller for the Appointment views

      Validates the fields and returns true if they are valid
      Parameters:

      description - The description of the appointment
      location - The location of the appointment
      type - The type of the appointment
      Returns:

    • validateTimes

      protected boolean validateTimes(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Validates the date and time fields and returns true if they are valid Ensures the times are in the future and that the start time is before the end time
      Parameters:
      start - The start date and time
      end - The end date and time
      Returns:
      True if the date and time fields are valid, otherwise false

    • validateWithinOfficeHours

      Validates that the start time is within EST office hours
      Parameters:

      Returns:
